import React from 'react' import "./Summary.css" import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { incrementProductsAmount,decrementProductsAmount } from '../../Store/cart/cartSlice' const SummaryCard = ({product}) => { return (

{product.name}

{product.desciption}

{`${product.price}$`}
{product.amount}
) } export default SummaryCard
